ygData.subject: Re: Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: It is very very tedious. You have to make a whole bunch of Flameless Lanterns which will get you up to 68, then Cams or Spyglasses will get you to 70. But
ygData.messageBody:
It is very very tedious. You have to make a whole bunch of Flameless Lanterns which will get you up to 68, then Cams or Spyglasses will get you to 70. But don't even bother trying to raise skill in tinkering if you are not level 26 or above because you will not raise a single point. There is a level cap on tinkering, I hope it's a bug but nonetheless, there is a cap. The formula for the cap is 5x(your level-15). This means that if you are not level 26 or above you can't get any skill raise. I wish you luck friend.

Brillian


----- Original Message -----
From: Lee
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, October 31, 1999 10:56 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill


Can you tell me how you got to 70? I cant get skill point 1.
----- Original Message -----
From: Brian Nelson
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 8:02 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill


I am a 29 gnome Wiz, I cannot seem to get my tinkering skill above 70, does anyone know why? I have spent so much money on tinkering now and my skill is 70, but even after I got to 70 skill I have made 30 spyglasses and 24 cams, no skill gain. Is there some kind of level cap?

Brillian Novaspire
29 Wiz
Solusek Ro
